name: Sony WH-1000XM5
description: Industry-leading noise canceling wireless headphones with 30-hour battery life. Features Auto NC Optimizer, Speak-to-Chat, multipoint connection, and crystal-clear call quality with 8 microphones.

reviews.review_text: Best ANC on the market. Office noise completely gone.
Comfort is unmatched for all-day coding sessions.
Sound quality is excellent. Worth the upgrade from XM4.
